name: IntimatelyMonsterous
description: Are you excited to begin your new life at college? Well, get ready because your in for one hell of a twist. Intimately Monstrous™ is a visual novel adventure that takes place in the infernal depths of the underworld. This project was developed by a team of talented and dedicated college students. In this game, you will traverse this dreaded land while meeting a charismatic cast of characters that are “excited” to meet the first human to attend their university. Intimately Monstrous™ features several endings between characters, so be careful or else you may not get the happy ending you want.
